      private String getNumberAndTypeOfDrinksInArea(ArrayList<Drink> area)

      Parameters:
      area - the area of drinks to be mapped
      Returns:
      a String of the number of drinks and type of drink from area

    • logToJson

      private void logToJson(String event)
      Creates and populates a Log object then serializes it and appends it to Log.json.

      Reads the existing Log.json file and deserializes into a map of logs mapped by date/time adds the new log to the map and then serializes the list and writes it back to Log.json.

      Parameters:
      event - text of the event that changed the state

    • getListOfDrinksByDrinkTypeFromArea

      Returns:
